page.title: 13THE PLAYING FIELDS (CONT)
page.content: These are the clubs that use the pavilion and the bridge field:-The playschool,the womens institue,the young wives,the bridge club,the football club,the cricket club, the carnival,the horticultral society,W.I.lunch club,parish council, mothers union,parents and friends of Grindleford school also for hire by any resident of Grindleford for parties etc. Our school used to use the little brown hut but now the Pavilion has been built we use it instead to get changed in.We use the playing fields for playing rounders and football.We can use our own football pitch or play across the big football pitch. BY John Oakley and Simon Jacques.
